item.title: When talk shows get political
item.description: When talk shows get political Late night show Ruth Bader Ginsburg - Mural NYC.

item.title: Voicing an opinion
item.description: Voicing an opinion Find out why Jill Biden is invited. Analyse what it shows to invite the wife of a presidential candidate to a talk show. Comment on the attitudes of the show hosts and what it means for viewers. Imagine the tweet of a viewer who complains that the show is biased.

item.title: Stars as hosts
item.description: Stars as talk show hosts. Document A Document B

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Talk shows: Information or Entertainement? Summary.pdf Summary Talk shows are an important feature of the US media landscape. They have established themselves as a legitimate source of information. Talk shows are not easily categorised because even the ones that position themselves primarily as comedy (late-night comedy shows) are also important forums of political discourse. Politically oriented talk shows are also dominated by prime time political analysis programming.
